descriptionNullable:
wikiHow Features dataset consists of features extracted from ~19.9k wikiHow articles. The task is to predict the `percent_helpful` column, which represents the number of readers who found the article helpful.

The articles are collected using the open-source tool [wikiHowUnofficialAPI](https://pypi.org/project/wikihowunofficialapi/).

The dataset is introduced in the (under review) paper Automated Quality Estimation of Collaboratively Created Content. If you find it helpful, please cite the paper.
title: wikiHow Features
subtitle: Features extracted from wikiHow articles
description:
wikiHow Features dataset consists of features extracted from ~19.9k wikiHow articles. The task is to predict the `percent_helpful` column, which represents the number of readers who found the article helpful.

The articles are collected using the open-source tool [wikiHowUnofficialAPI](https://pypi.org/project/wikihowunofficialapi/).

The dataset is introduced in the (under review) paper Automated Quality Estimation of Collaboratively Created Content. If you find it helpful, please cite the paper.
